about.title: Building the future of AI, one solution at a time
about.description: We're a boutique AI studio that combines deep technical expertise with practical business acumen to deliver AI solutions that actually work in production.
about.our_story: เรื่องราวของเรา
about.story_description: ก่อตั้งขึ้นในปี 2025 เราเชื่อมั่นว่า AI เป็นเครื่องมือที่ทรงพลังซึ่งสามารถใช้แก้ปัญหาในหลายโดเมนและสร้างโอกาสใหม่ เราเริ่มต้นด้วยวิสัยที่ง่าย: ทำให้ AI เข้าถึงได้และใช้งานได้จริงสำหรับทุกคน
about.founded_description: เริ่มต้นด้วยวิสัยที่จะทำให้ AI เข้าถึงได้และใช้งานได้จริงสำหรับทุกคน
about.products_description: พัฒนาแอปพลิเคชันและบริการ AI ที่หลากหลาย
about.clients_description: ให้บริการลูกค้าในหลายอุตสาหกรรม
about.applications_services: แอปพลิเคชันและบริการของเรา
about.applications_description: เราพัฒนาแอปพลิเคชันนวัตกรรมและให้บริการเฉพาะทางที่แก้ปัญหาในโลกจริงโดยใช้เทคโนโลยี AI
about.platform_solutions: โซลูชันแพลตฟอร์ม
about.edge_ai_solutions: โซลูชัน Edge AI
about.computer_vision_solutions: โซลูชัน Computer Vision
about.achievements: ความสำเร็จของเรา
about.achievements_description: การยอมรับจากผู้นำอุตสาหกรรมและความสำเร็จในการเป็นพันธมิตรยืนยันความเชี่ยวชาญและความมุ่งมั่น
about.achievements_products: แอปพลิเคชันและบริการ AI
about.achievements_projects: โครงการที่สำเร็จ
about.achievements_uptime: ความพร้อมใช้งาน
about.achievements_support: การสนับสนุนตลอด 24 ชั่วโมง
about.testimonials: ลูกค้าพูดถึงเราอย่างไร
about.testimonials_description: ความคิดเห็นจริงจากองค์กรที่เราเป็นพันธมิตรในการส่งมอบโซลูชัน AI ที่สร้างผลลัพธ์ที่วัดได้
about.our_team: ทีมผู้เชี่ยวชาญ
about.trust: ความไว้วางใจ
about.trust_description: เราให้ความสำคัญกับความโปร่งใสและความน่าเชื่อถือในทุกโครงการ
about.impact_description: เราเชื่อว่า AI ควรช่วยแก้ปัญหาในโลกจริงและสร้างคุณค่าที่มีความหมาย
about.collaboration: การทำงานร่วมกัน
about.collaboration_description: เราทำงานร่วมกับทีมของคุณ ไม่ใช่แค่ทำงานให้ แต่มั่นใจที่จะถ่ายทอดความและความสำเร็จที่ยั่งยืนยาว

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To democratize AI adoption by providing enterprise-grade solutions that are practical, scalable, and deliver measurable business value. We bridge the gap between cutting-edge AI research and real-world implementation.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading boutique AI studio in Southeast Asia, known for our technical excellence, practical approach, and ability to deliver AI solutions that transform businesses and create lasting competitive advantages.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: These core principles guide everything we do and shape how we work with our clients.

innovation.title: Innovation First
innovation.description: We push the boundaries of what's possible with AI, always staying ahead of the curve.

collaboration.title: Collaborative Partnership
collaboration.description: We work alongside your team, not just for you, ensuring knowledge transfer and sustainable success.

excellence.title: Excellence in Delivery
excellence.description: Every project is delivered with production-ready quality, comprehensive documentation, and measurable outcomes.

impact.title: Positive Impact
impact.description: We believe AI should solve real-world problems and create meaningful value for businesses and society.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: Our diverse team of AI experts, engineers, and business strategists work together to deliver exceptional results.

cta.title: Ready to work with us?
cta.description: Let's discuss how we can help transform your business with AI. Our team is ready to explore your challenges and design solutions that deliver real value.

blog.title: Blog & Insights
blog.description: Stay updated with the latest trends, best practices, and technical insights from our AI experts. Learn from real-world implementations and industry case studies.

authors.title: Meet Our Expert Authors
authors.subtitle: Our blog content is written by leading AI industry experts with years of experience implementing AI across various industries.

newsletter.title: Stay Updated
newsletter.description: Get the latest AI insights, case studies, and technical articles delivered to your inbox. No spam, just valuable content from our expert team.

resources.title: Resources & Downloads
resources.description: Access our comprehensive collection of whitepapers, webinars, templates, and guides to accelerate your AI journey. All resources are free and based on real-world experience.

newsletter.title: Get New Resources First
newsletter.description: Be the first to access our latest whitepapers, webinars, and templates. Subscribe to our newsletter for exclusive content and early access to new resources.

support.title: Need Help Getting Started?
support.description: Our team of AI experts is here to help you implement these resources and accelerate your AI journey.

careers.title: Build the Future of AI with Us
careers.description: Join a team of passionate AI experts who are transforming businesses through innovative technology. Work on cutting-edge projects, learn from industry leaders, and make a real impact.

culture.title: Our Culture
culture.subtitle: We believe that great AI solutions come from great teams. Here's what makes working at CerebraTechAI special.

innovation.title: Innovation First

career.description: Clear career paths, mentorship programs, and opportunities to work on diverse projects.

cta.description: We're always looking for talented individuals who share our passion for AI innovation. Send us your resume and let's explore opportunities together.

pricing.description: Our packages are designed to meet you where you are in your AI journey. From exploration to production, we have the right solution for your needs and budget.

packages.subtitle: Choose the package that best fits your current needs and budget. All packages include our core expertise and proven methodologies.

phitiai.name: Phithiai
phitiai.heroSubtitle: Bridging the gap between centuries-old traditions and modern technology. A consolidated platform for planning Thai ceremonies with clarity and ease.
phitiai.problemDesc: Thai ceremonies require attention to detail, but younger generation lacks time and knowledge of ritual details.
phitiai.solutionDesc: AI that understands Thai culture helps create blessing cards, plan merit ceremonies, and calculate auspicious times in seconds.
phitiai.feature1_desc: Powered by RAG and Vector Search to provide culturally accurate recommendations
phitiai.feature2_desc: Plan merit ceremonies and calculate auspicious times with AI
phitiai.feature3_desc: Buy and sell Prompts and Digital Assets for traditional ceremonies

marketplace.title: Multi-Sided Marketplace Ecosystem
marketplace.description: A complete ecosystem connecting users, vendors, and service providers in one seamless platform.

techStack.title: Built with Modern Tech
techStack.description: Our robust architecture ensures scalability, reliability, and exceptional user experience.

phitiai.ctaTitle: Need a complex platform built with modern standards?

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Phithiai platform.
faq.a1: Simply select a festival, enter recipient's name, and wait for AI to create card in seconds.
faq.a2: Supports all Thai festivals including Songkran, Loy Krathong, New Year, and general merit ceremonies.
faq.a3: Our AI is trained on thousands of Thai ceremony data, achieving 90%+ accuracy in auspicious timing and ritual recommendations.
faq.a4: Yes! You can choose from pre-designed templates or create custom cards with AI assistance.

sookwai.name: Sookwai
sookwai.heroTitle: Launch Digital Health Business in Days
sookwai.heroSubtitle: Complete wellness platform for elderly care with smart billing, PDPA compliance, tele-health, and AI & IoT integration.
sookwai.feature1_desc: Automatic membership system with Trial and Grace Period

techStack.title: Built with Modern Tech
techStack.description: Our robust architecture ensures scalability, reliability, and exceptional user experience.

successStory.title: Success Story
successStory.subtitle: See how our platform has helped businesses transform elderly care.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Sookwai platform.
faq.a1: Yes, we use PDPA standards and 100% Audit Log for bank-level security.
faq.q2: Can it connect to IoT devices?
faq.a2: Yes, supports IoT devices for fall detection and health tracking.

pluktunraka.name: ปลูกทันราคา
pluktunraka.heroTitle: Plant Based on Price - Plan Backwards with AI
pluktunraka.heroSubtitle: Predict crop prices 3-6 months ahead, get crop recommendations, and analyze market trends to maximize your profit.
pluktunraka.feature1_desc: Predict crop prices 3-6 months in advance
pluktunraka.feature2_desc: Recommend crops suitable for soil and season
pluktunraka.green: Good time to plant - prices expected to rise
pluktunraka.red: Not recommended - prices expected to fall
pluktunraka.successTitle: Khon Kaen farmer reduced fertilizer costs by 30%
pluktunraka.successDesc: Using our AI-powered recommendations, farmers can optimize planting schedules and reduce costs significantly.
pluktunraka.ctaDesc: Start using AI for your farm today

faq.q1: What is accuracy of price predictions?
faq.a1: Average accuracy 85-90%, depending on crop type and available data.
faq.a2: Supports major Thai economic crops including rice, corn, cassava, and garden vegetables.

smartfarm.name: SmartFarm
smartfarm.heroTitle: Bring Cloud AI Power to Your Farm Edge
smartfarm.heroSubtitle: Real-time monitoring with Edge Computing, Always-On connectivity, and WeighVision™ for enterprise-scale farming.
smartfarm.feature1_desc: Works even without internet using Edge AI
smartfarm.feature4_desc: Scalable from small farms to large enterprises

stats.title: Why Choose SmartFarm?
stats.subtitle: Built for reliability and performance in any environment

weighVision.title: WeighVision™ Technology
weighVision.description: Revolutionary AI-powered weighing system that transforms how you measure and assess produce quality in real-time.
weighVision.feature1_desc: Accurate weight measurements with AI-powered quality assessment
weighVision.feature2_desc: AI analyzes produce quality, size, and grade automatically
weighVision.feature3_desc: Track yield trends and optimize production with data-driven insights

offlineFirst.title: Offline-First Architecture
offlineFirst.description: Our system works even without internet connection, ensuring your farm never stops monitoring.
offlineFirst.feature1_desc: AI runs locally on edge devices for real-time decisions
offlineFirst.feature2_desc: Data syncs to cloud when connection is restored
offlineFirst.feature3_desc: Store up to 30 days of data locally without internet
offlineFirst.feature4_desc: Multiple connectivity options including 4G/5G and LoRaWAN

techStack.title: Built with Modern Tech
techStack.description: Our robust architecture ensures scalability, reliability, and exceptional user experience.
techStack.edgeDesc: Raspberry Pi, NVIDIA Jetson, and custom hardware
techStack.mobileDesc: React Native for iOS and Android

smartfarm.starterDesc: 1 sensor node, Basic dashboard, Mobile app
smartfarm.farmDesc: 5 sensor nodes, Advanced analytics, Alert system

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about SmartFarm platform.
faq.a1: Yes, Edge Computing allows operation without internet, and syncs data when connection is available.
faq.a2: Supports temperature, humidity, light intensity, soil pH, and gas sensors.
faq.a3: WeighVision™ achieves 99.5% accuracy in weight measurement and quality assessment using advanced AI models.
faq.q4: Can I integrate with existing farm systems?
faq.a4: Yes, we provide API integration with popular farm management systems and custom integrations are available.

cerebraforge.name: CerebraForge
cerebraforge.heroSubtitle: Complete RAG infrastructure with multi-model support, enterprise security, and RBAC. Deploy in weeks, not months.
cerebraforge.feature2_desc: Support multiple LLM Models in one platform
cerebraforge.feature3_desc: Enterprise-level security with RBAC and Audit Log
cerebraforge.feature4_desc: Built-in vector database for semantic search
cerebraforge.enterpriseDesc: Unlimited tokens, Dedicated support, Custom deployment

faq.a1: CerebraForge is an Enterprise RAG Platform that combines RAG infrastructure in one place, reducing development time from months to weeks.
faq.a2: Supports OpenAI GPT-4, Anthropic Claude, and Local LLMs via Ollama or vLLM.

chartsentinel.name: ChartSentinel
chartsentinel.heroSubtitle: Detect process anomalies in real-time with AI, integrate lab quality data, and reduce defects by up to 40%.
chartsentinel.feature1_desc: Detect anomalies in real-time with AI
chartsentinel.feature2_desc: Connect lab quality data with process data
chartsentinel.feature3_desc: Combine Real-Time Signals and Lab Quality in one platform
chartsentinel.feature4_desc: Statistical Process Control with AI-powered alerts
chartsentinel.pilotDesc: 1 production line, Basic analytics, Email support
chartsentinel.productionDesc: 5 production lines, Advanced analytics, Priority support
chartsentinel.enterpriseDesc: Unlimited lines, Custom integrations, On-premise deployment

faq.q1: How does ChartSentinel help reduce errors?
faq.a1: AI system detects anomalies in real-time, alerting before problems occur, reducing errors by up to 40%.
faq.a2: Supports common MES systems via API and allows custom integration.

vetpath.name: VetPath AI
vetpath.heroSubtitle: Digital pathology platform with AI diagnosis, cloud-based slide management, and collaboration features for veterinarians.
vetpath.feature1_desc: Diagnose diseases with high accuracy AI
vetpath.feature3_desc: Share and consult with other veterinarians
vetpath.feature4_desc: Support for dogs, cats, and exotic animals
vetpath.enterpriseDesc: Unlimited slides, Custom models, On-premise deployment

faq.q1: What is accuracy of AI Diagnosis?
faq.a1: Average accuracy 92-95%, depending on disease type and slide quality.
faq.a2: Supports SVS, TIFF, NDPI and common Digital Slide formats.

faq.title: คำถามที่พบบ่อย
faq.subtitle: ทุกสิ่งที่คุณต้องรู้เกี่ยวกับหลักสูตร Skill 400++
faq.q1: จะได้เรียนทักษะอะไรบ้าง?
faq.a1: Full Stack Development รวมถึง React, Next.js, Node.js, Python, PostgreSQL และแนวปฏิบัติ DevOps สมัยใหม่
faq.q2: รับรองการสัมภาษณ์งานไหม?
faq.a2: ใช่! เรารับรองการสัมภาษณ์งานกับพาร์ทเนอร์ที่รับสมัครงานของเราหลังจบหลักสูตรสำเร็จ
faq.q3: ISA ทำงานอย่างไร?
faq.a3: คุณเรียนฟรีและจ่ายเพียง 15% จากเงินเดือนเป็นเวลา 12 เดือนหลังจากได้งานที่มีเงินเดือน 15,000+ บาท
faq.q4: มีการอบรมบริษัทไหม?
faq.a4: ใช่ เรามีหลักสูตรการอบรมบริษัทที่ปรับแต่งได้สำหรับทีม 10 คนขึ้น พร้อมสิทธิประโยชน์ด้านภาษี
